sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_926
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/src/ZVAD_Task.c line 1511 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/src/ZVAD_Task.c line 3327 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/test/swut/ZVAD_Task.c.test line 1434 ICAS1::ZK-Adapter shall set so_ZV_Anf_Challenge_Auth_can := 0 after the signal has been sent (with value 1) on CAN.
Note regarding the characteristic of the ZV_02.ZV_Anf_Challenge_Auth CAN signal: Message sending type = Cyclic Signal sending type = IfActiveWithRepetition (3 repetitions; 50ms fast cycle)
When the signal is inactive, it is sent with a 200ms cycle on CAN. When this signal becomes active, CAN signal will be sent with a 50ms cycle until application resets the signal to 0. After resetting, the CAN signal will be additionally sent 3 times with a 50ms cycle with value 0. See details at: http://rbg:8080/dwa/rm/urn:rational::1-43f9e04918531f6c-O-626-0012384e?doors.view=00000002
ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_926 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1287
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/src/ZVAD_Task.c line 1476 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/src/ZVAD_Task.c line 3279 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/test/swut/ZVAD_Task.c.test line 1197 The ICAS1::ZK-Adapter monitors signals listed in _939 for changes.
IF the status of any of the signals listed in _939 has changed,
THEN ICAS1::ZK-Adapter shall notify ICAS1::SOK-FM about this change by calling ExteriorSkinStatus_change_indication function (using client-server interface)
Note: Specific callback must be implemented by ICAS1::SOK-FM. As a result ICAS1::SOK-FM generates and sends a Challenge.
The Challenge has to be sent in accordance with the requirements of the ICAS1::SOK to the ICAS1::ZK-Adapter.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1287 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM
